name: Roots (OMOEXPERIENCES)
description:
What is Roots?

Roots is a game where your goal is to explore through an enormous mess of roots and find the 5 glowing spheres. However, be sure not to fall to your demise, otherwise you'll have to reset.

How do I play?

WASD = the moving keys

Space bar = Jumping

Shift = Sprint/Boost

Master the controls well and you should be able to get the hang of it. Also, be aware that you can bounce off the roots, so try to control yourself in the air to not fall.

Enjoy!
